data.meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.
data.sentence: The word رَبُّكَ comes from the root ر ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word عَذَابٍ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.

data.meanings: to pour out, be poured out. sabbun - the act of pouring. sabban - the act of pouring heavily.
data.sentence: The word فَصَبَّ comes from the root ص ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to pour out, be poured out. sabbun - the act of pouring. sabban - the act of pouring heavily.

data.meanings: to mingle, mix, begin (war), be oppressed, sout - mixture, scourage, portion, leather whip, lash, lot. sauta adhab - mixture of various punishment resembling a scourage, share or portion of punishment, whip of punishment.
data.sentence: The word سَوْطَ comes from the root س و ط and is associated with the meanings: to mingle, mix, begin (war), be oppressed, sout - mixture, scourage, portion, leather whip, lash, lot. sauta adhab - mixture of various punishment resembling a scourage, share or portion of punishment, whip of punishment.
